product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: GENERAL CIVIL > ROADS & FLEXIBLE PAVEMENT (UPTO WBM/WMM LAYER)
product_entries.full_product_description: Modification Works MODIFICATION AND EXTRA WORKS ( IF ANY ) Cuting,bevelling,fitup,welding of different sizes of CS piping of all thicknesses in shop ,in position, on ground and at all elevations, transportation of pipes,fittings,flanges etc. from owner's storage point to work site/workshop,making necessary scaffolding,consumables,machinery,tools,tackles,labour and supervision including attending to repairs for completing the work as per instructions of Engineer -in - charge Hacksaw cutting CS piping (ITEM NO: 01GC.27.1.2)
